typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
CollectAndCount derive(median = ratingsCollection[iif(toInteger(round(ratingsCount/2))==0,1,toInteger(round(ratingsCount/2)))]) ~> CalcMedian
FindMiddleRowNum aggregate(groupBy(year),
	ratingsCollection = collect(Rating),
		ratingsCount = count()) ~> CollectAndCount
source1 window(over(year),
	asc(Rating, true),
	rownum = rowNumber()) ~> RowNumByYear
RowNumByYear window(over(year),
	asc(rownum, true),
	medianrow = toInteger(round(max(rownum)/2))) ~> FindMiddleRowNum
CalcMedian sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
